description: Add Only Flag. Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Academic_Period_Date_Controls_Data.description: Reference ID for the Academic Period

Academic_UnitObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Academic_UnitObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Academic_UnitObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Academic_Period_Date_Controls_Control_Da.description: Date to be assigned to the Academic Period Control Date
None for Academic Period Control Date indicator

Academic_Period_Date_Controls_Data.description: Wrapper element for each Academic Period Control Date

validation.validation: Specify a Control Date. You can't use the course section start date for this date control: [date control].
You can only specify each date control once per academic period for an academic unit and level or a program of study. Specify this date control only once: [date control].
You can’t use this date control for programs of study: [date control]
Specify exactly one of these options for each date control: Control Date, Use Course Section Start, or None.
Don't specify an Academic Period Date Control for [dci] because it provides no functionality.

description: Wrapper element for Academic Period Date Controls data

validation.validation: Specify either an academic unit and level or a program of study. You can’t specify both.
Specify a program of study that is stand-alone.
Specify an academic level that exists for this academic unit.
